ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: No... i think you are dead on. Verant has probably screwed up again. But i didnt even have enough energy to to scream more about the 54/23 nerf... just getting
ygData.messageBody:
No... i think you are dead on. Verant has probably screwed up again. But i
didnt even have enough energy to to scream more about the 54/23 nerf... just
getting rapidly fed up with all the crap =(

Gendal Concorden, lvl 55... and almost 56 but who cares cause 56's songs
suck. Who has time to check what time it is in Norrath everytime they want
to use a song? And its not even like the frickan songs are all that usefull
anyways. Sigh... ok.... 57 looks usefull but thats a whole lvl away :(

----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 5:29 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces


> i really thought i would have gotten more interest in this, and maybe
> sparked verant to look at it, so i have a question about all this... do
you
> think i am wrong? am i just comlaining? or does no one really care at this
> point? are there a lot of bards here hunting in sebilis and hoping for
some
> new armor? well, if you want the thread again here it is:
>
> http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/050924.html
>
> i just want to have the same chance as all the other classes at the new
> armor set from kunark that we are all entitled too, and what i have come
to
> believe at this point does not exist. could it be the quest? maybe but i
> doubt it. every single other class has their pieces drop in sebilis, why
> have bards quest for it? oh well...
>
> Shada, 54.8 Bard
> Mith Marr
>
>
> >
> > My guess, and it ties into the Burynai Bunt Cake quest
> > that we haven't
> > figgered out yet, is that the helm that Treekill gives as the
> > reward is the
> > Singing Steel Helm. His talk says that he got it from a bard,
> > that the helm
> > is only usable by bards, and that the bard said it came from
> > Sebilis where
> > all of the class helms are coming from that I know of.
> > If the quest for the cake turns out to be quite
> > elaborate and time
> > consuming then I can see Verant putting this as the reward.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Old school buds here:
> http://click.egroups.com/1/5536/10/_/451022/_/961028829/
